string-array.name: tweets
string-array.item: This vegan sandwich we are holding tasted sooooo good!
Lyndsy, thank u for reviewing my book. I love how you started your review: "I didn't want to read this book." SMILE!
Thank you so much for reading my book and for writing this review in The Huffington Post.
